BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 270259Z AUG
   BY M/V VERITAS VANTAGE TOWING EIGHT
   7000 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-00.65S 043-47.01W, 24-00.61S 043-26.33W,
   24-45.00S 043-26.33W, 24-45.00S 043-47.01W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 270359Z AUG.
